page.title: 15FARMING IN MYLOR
page.content:
Restronguet Barton is a farm in Mylor which has 360 acres and has been with the same family for many years.
It has 112 Fresian milking cows which are milked twice a day in a 6 by 6 herring bone milking parlour,there are also 22 Fresian cross Hereford heifers and 1 Hereford Bull.
The crops on the farm are as follows:-winter barley,winter wheat, spring barley,forage peas,maize, grass,stubble turnips,and sweet corn. The farm has 5 houses and 20 separate farm buildings,5 working people,5 tractors,1 combine harvester and many implements.It has its own water supply which is a bore-hole called J.R and a spring,0.5 an acre of woods and two quarries.
